description: Start with n; repeatedly sum squares of prime factors (counted with multiplicity), until reach a prime p, then set a(n) = p; if reach a fixed point q, set a(n) = q; set a(n) = 0 if no limit exists.
author: _Dann Toliver_
extensions: More terms from Michel ten Voorde (seqfan(AT)tenvoorde.org) Apr 12 2001
